[size=+2]Description:[/size]
"Races and Doomstones LO-REbalanced" is my take on bringing back some of the racial and birthsign traits from Morrowind and Oblivion while also trying to rebalance them staying as true to lore as possible. The plugin is still in development and will be finalized when the CK arrives.

[size=+2]Changes so far:[/size]
(a list of changes between versions can be found under changelog)

[color=cyan][size=+1]RACES[/size][/color]

[color=yellow]Altmer/Highelves:[/color]
+10 Illusion, +5 Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Alchemy, Enchanting
Altmer Blood passive: 100 Magicka (previously 50) 50% resistance to disease (new) 15% Elemental weakness (new)
Highborn Greater Power: Restore Magicka 10x faster (same) Destruction spells are 20% stronger (new)

[color=yellow]Bosmer/Woodelves:[/color]
+10 Archery, +5 Sneak, Lockpicking, Alteration, Light Armor, Alchemy
Bosmer Blood passive:75% disease resistance (prev.50) 25% poison resistance (prev.50) 15% weakness to fire (new)
Hunter's Eye Greater Power (new): +50% bow damage for 60 seconds, 10% chance to paralyze target for 2 sec.

[color=yellow]Dunmer/Darkelves:[/color]
+10 Destruction, +5 One-Hand, Illusion, Sneak, Light Armor, Marksman
Dunmer Blood passive: 75% fire resistance (prev. 50) 25% disease resistance (new) ; 25% weakness to shock (new)

[color=yellow]Bretons:[/color]
+10 Conjuration, +5 Illusion, Restoration, Speechcraft, Alchemy, Alteration
Breton Blood passive: 50 Magicka (new) 25% magic resistance (same)
Dragonskin Greater Power: 50% Spell Absorption (same) 60 armor (new)

[color=yellow]Nords:[/color]
+10 Two-Handed, +5 One-Handed, Block, Smithing, Light Armor, Restoration
Nord Blood passive: 50% frost resistance (same) 25% shock resistance (new)
Woad Greater Power (new): 100 armor for 60 seconds

[color=yellow]Redguards:[/color]
+10 One-Handed, +5 Marksman, Block, Speechcraft, Light Armor, Heavy Armor
Redguard Blood passive: 50% poison resistance (same) 50% disease resistance (new) 25% weakness to Frost (new)
Adrenaline Rush Greater Power: Stamina regenerates 10 times faster (same) +20% attack/sprinting speed (new)
Spirit Sword Greater Power (new): Bound Sword for 60 sec

[color=yellow]Argonian:[/color]
+10 Lockpicking, +5 Pickpocket, Sneak, Light Armor, Alteration, Illusion
Argonian Blood passive: Poison immunity (new) 50% disease resistance (same)
Argonian Claws passive (new): 2, 6, 12. 18, 24, 30 damage at level 1, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50

[color=yellow]Khajiit:[/color]
+10 Sneak, +5 Lockpicking, Pickpocket, Alchemy, One-Handed, Speechcraft
Claws passive: 4, 8, 16, 24, 32, 40 damage at level 1, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 (new)
Khajit Blood passive (new): +10% speed ; 15% fire resist ; 15% frost resist
Night Eye: Infinite duration toggle (prev. 60 sec)

[color=yellow]Orcs:[/color]
+10 Smithing, +5 Heavy Armor, One-Handed, Two-Handed, Block, Enchanting
Orc Blood passive (new): 15% magic resistance ; +25% health regeneration ; 25% weakness to poison

[color=yellow]Imperials:[/color]
+10 Speechcraft, +5 Alteration, Enchanting, One-Handed, Block, Heavy Armor
Star of the West Lesser Power (new): Absorb 100 stamina on touch (costs 100 magicka)
Imperial Diplomacy Greater Power (new): +25 speech for 30 seconds

[color=yellow]more to come...[/color]


[color=red][size=+1]DOOMSTONES[/size][/color]

[color=green]Atronach:[/color]
150 Magicka (prev. 50) 50% spell absorb (same) Stunted Magicka = No Regeneration (prev. -50%)

[color=green]Apprentice:[/color]
100 Magicka (new) 100% Magicka regen (same) 75% weakness to magic (prev. 100)

[color=green]Mage:[/color]
Magic Skills improve 10% faster (prev. 20) 25 Magicka (new) 5% stronger spells (new)

[color=green]Warrior:[/color]
Combat Skills improve 10% faster (prev. 20) 10% melee damage (new)

[color=green]Thief:[/color]
Stealth Skills improve 10% faster (prev. 20) 8% chance to dodge melee attacks (new)

[color=green]Lord:[/color]
75% Health recovery (new) 50% weakness to fire (new) 25% weakness to poison (new) removed old effects

[color=green]Lady:[/color]
75 armor (new) 15% magic resistance (new) removed old effects

[color=green]Lover:[/color]
All skills improve 10% faster (prev. 15) 50% disease resistance (new) +50 carry weight (new)
Allure Greater Power (new): Command humanoid of the opposite sex for 60sec

[color=green]Steed:[/color]
No movement penalty (same) 50% stamina regen (new) +25% speed (new) 50% weakness to Frost (new)

[color=green]Tower:[/color]
Unlock Master Lock once per day (prev. Expert) 10% damage reflection (new)

[color=green]more to come...[/color]


[size=+2]Formatting Changes:[/size]
All racial traits and Doomstone effects have the Lord/Lady formatting:
>Traitname<: >Effect< e.g. "The Atronach: Fortify Magicka"



[size=+2]Optional FIle:[/size]
AltarsRestoreMagicka.esp:
Altars Restore Magicka is a small optional download to make your life under the Atronach a bit easier as it lets you regenerate your mana at all altars. It effects all altars of the 9 divines as well as the altar of Nocturnal. As a small bonus I fixed the 0% description of the "Blessing of Talos"



[size=+2]Installation:[/size]
1. Extract the Races and Doomstones.esp to your Data folder (...\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data)
2. Run the Launcher, activate the esp and start the game
3. To update an existing charachter, unequip all enchanted gear, open the console (tilde key, next to 1) and type in showracemenu
4. At this point your make-up, warpaint and skin tone will be reset adjust them to your liking then hit R, rename your character and close the race menu.
5. Save the game and quit to the main menu
6. After loading the saved game all racial traits should be applied correctly.
7. To update your active Doomstone effect, change your current one to any other Doomstone then back to the one you were using before.



[size=+2]Known Issues:[/size]
-All Atronach, Lord and Steed effects will be displayed in red even though not all are detrimental. Until the CK arrives it is either a) display all in red or b) hide all negative effects.

-The Khajiit Night Eye effect isn't displayed in your "Active Effects" tab.

-Most descriptions don't reflect the changes

-Existing characters will not change skills according to new initial bonusses


[size=+2]Compatibility:[/size]
This mod isn't compatible with any mod that changes racial traits and Doomstone effects



[size=+2]Future Plans[/size]
Add different starting Health/Stamina/Magicka based on Race
Change all Doomstones
Balance out all changes
[...]



[size=+2]Credits:[/size]
Dave Humphrey for SkyEdit as without his effort this wouldn't have been possible (at least for me :) )

-Fixed lost Spellslot and FX information on some Abilities
